channel.title: A 'Bucket List'
channel.description:
Hey all you forum people
as some of you may know, i am currently studying Justice Administration, which im aiming to have completed by the end of March, which will be followed by an application into the Police Academy.
Leaving me with around 2 months in which to do something.
Me and a mate of mine where drinking and talking tonight and decided that a 'bucket list' is what we should do in those 2 months.
I am wanting to make a list of 101 things to do. These things should be the kind of things that you can start a conversation about... something to impress someone... something that everyone should do for the experience, but probably never do.
One thing that springs to my mind is Ski diving... so things along those lines... things everyone should experience i there life.
I need help coming up with things for the list, i have a few at the moment and wanna finish it by tomorrow.
So, what would you add to a 'bucket list'

item.title: A 'Bucket List'
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

[quote=“Cheese_Police, post:16, topic:260186”]Here’s a suggestion for you:

GTFO[/quote]
+1

Read full topic

item.title: A 'Bucket List'
item.dc:creator: @Original_Daniel Original Daniel
item.description:
@Original_Daniel wrote:

If you’ve seen the cky challenge or scavenger hunt episodes of viva la bam, pick one and do that. If you haven’t watch them and then pick one and do it.

edit: here’s the scavenger hunt list anyway.
http://forums.comingsoon.net/archive/index.php/t-22488.html

Read full topic

item.title: A 'Bucket List'
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

[quote=“Squigglyo, post:13, topic:260186”][quote author=runescape3dude link=topic=343502.msg2654314#msg2654314 date=1233753170]
Get 10K posts on MITB
Fuck a teacher
Suck a boob
Lick a pussy
get laid
drive a car off a bridge and survive
do a nurse
do a doctor
do a dog
do a goat
do a sheep
crash a Ferrari in Italy
visit russia
get drunk
beat a nerd up at school
become obese
play xbox
sell something for a million dollars
grow some nads
go up to a random girl and play with her hair
go to the beach
kill a hillbilly
kill a redneck
complain about obama
[/quote]

im just over halfway thru that list already…[/quote]

Well then

runescape3dude:

do goatee

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

Did you mean sky diving?

Here’s a few things

  1. Do a barrel roll
  2. Learn to play the cello
  3. Smoke a gram of pot in under a minute
